statements: SELECT * FROM sustainable_development_goals
SELECT goal_id, goal_name, progress FROM sustainable_development_goals WHERE progress > 50
SELECT goal_id, goal_name, target FROM sustainable_development_goals ORDER BY goal_id DESC
SELECT goal_name, indicator FROM sustainable_development_goals WHERE target = 'Affordable Housing' AND progress < 40
SELECT goal_id, goal_name, progress FROM sustainable_development_goals WHERE goal_name LIKE '%Education%'
SELECT * FROM sustainable_development_goals WHERE goal_id = 1 ORDER BY goal_name DESC;
SELECT goal_name, indicator, progress FROM sustainable_development_goals WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT goal_id, goal_name, target, indicator FROM sustainable_development_goals WHERE target = 'Climate Action' ORDER BY goal_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT goal_id FROM sustainable_development_goals WHERE progress < 30;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_development_goals WHERE goal_id IN (3, 5) ORDER BY goal_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sdg_progress WHERE sdg_id = 1;
SELECT target, progress FROM sdg_progress WHERE progress > 0.5;
SELECT sdg_id, update_date, target FROM sdg_progress ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ar_visualization WHERE location LIKE 'Europe%';
SELECT visualization_id, location FROM ar_visualization ORDER BY visualization_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sdg_progress WHERE progress > 0.5 ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT sdg_id, target FROM sdg_progress WHERE target LIKE 'Goal%' ORDER BY sdg_id;
SELECT * FROM sdg_progress WHERE update_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sdg_progress WHERE progress BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY target DESC;
SELECT sdg_id, AVG(progress) AS avg_progress FROM sdg_progress GROUP BY sdg_id HAVING avg_progress > 0.4;
SELECT * FROM progress_data;
SELECT goal_name, progress_percentage FROM progress_data WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT username, email, age FROM user_data WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM visualization_data WHERE visualization_type = 'chart';
SELECT user_id, goal_id, visualization_type FROM visualization_data ORDER BY visualization_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM progress_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, visualization_type FROM user_data JOIN visualization_data ON user_data.user_id = visualization_data.user_id;
SELECT goal_name, goal_description, progress_percentage FROM progress_data WHERE progress_percentage >= 50 ORDER BY goal_name ASC;

SELECT username, email, country, goal_name, progress_percentage FROM user_data JOIN visualization_data ON user_data.user_id = visualization_data.user_id JOIN progress_data ON visualization_data.goal_id = progress_data.id ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM SustainableGoalsData;
SELECT goal_name, target_date FROM SustainableGoalsData;
SELECT description, goal_name FROM SustainableGoalsData;
SELECT * FROM ProgressData WHERE progress_percentage >= 50;
SELECT location_id, country, region FROM LocationData;
SELECT goal_name, description FROM SustainableGoalsData WHERE target_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ProgressData WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY updated_on DESC;
SELECT goal_name, country, region FROM SustainableGoalsData JOIN LocationData ON SustainableGoalsData.goal_id = LocationData.location_id;
SELECT goal_name, country, visualization_type FROM SustainableGoalsData JOIN ARVisualization ON SustainableGoalsData.goal_id = ARVisualization.goal_id WHERE ARVisualization.visualization_type = '3D';
SELECT country, COUNT(*) AS goal_count FROM LocationData GROUP BY country HAVING goal_count > 1 ORDER BY goal_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM goals;
SELECT goal_name, target_value FROM goals WHERE current_progress < target_value;
SELECT indicator_name, current_value FROM indicators ORDER BY current_value DESC;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM data_sources WHERE source_type = 'Database';
SELECT tool_name, tool_type, supported_data_sources FROM visualization_tools WHERE tool_type = 'Chart';
SELECT goal_id, goal_name, target_value, current_progress FROM goals;
SELECT indicator_name, target_goal_id, current_value FROM indicators ORDER BY current_value DESC;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM data_sources WHERE source_type = 'Database';
SELECT tool_name, tool_type, supported_data_sources FROM visualization_tools WHERE tool_type = 'Chart';
SELECT * FROM data_records WHERE record_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY record_date ASC;
